contentrichtext.text: <noinclude>{{../doc}} {{divhide|Staging area}} ==Images== Use only ONE image at a time <gallery> File:EthelUn.jpg|Æthelred II of England File:Trafalgar square night small.jpg|Trafalgar Square File:Trafalgar square clouds.jpg|Trafalgar Square File:Nevado del Ruiz by Edgar.png|Nevado del Ruiz File:TouchWall.jpg|Vietnam Veterans Memorial File:Vietnam-memorial-soldier.jpg|Vietnam Veterans Memorial </gallery> ==Ineligible== {|class="wikitable" |- !Blurb !Reason |- | [[1642]] – [[First English Civil War]]: The [[Cavalier|Royalist]] army engaged the much larger [[Roundhead|Parliamentarian]] army at the '''[[Battle of Turnham Green]]''' near [[Turnham Green]], [[Middlesex]]. | lifted off PD |- | [[1965]] – The [[Steamboat|steamship]] '''[[SS Yarmouth Castle|SS ''Yarmouth Castle'']]''' burned and sank about 60 miles (100 km) northwest of [[Nassau, Bahamas]], killing about 90 people. | refimprove |- | [[2000]] – '''[[Joseph Estrada]]''' became the first [[President of the Philippines]] to be [[Impeachment|impeached]] after he was accused of taking a sum of {{Nowrap|400 million}} [[Philippine peso|pesos]] in [[Bribery|bribe]]s from [[Gaming law|illegal gambling]] sources. | Tagged with {{tl|refimprove}} |} ==Eligible== {{*mp}} [[1002]] – King '''[[Æthelred the Unready|Æthelred II]]''' ordered '''[[St. Brice's Day massacre|the massacre]]''' of all Danes in England. {{*mp}} [[1914]] – [[Zaian War]]: [[Zayanes|Zaian Berber]] tribesmen routed French forces in Morocco at the '''[[Battle of El Herri]]'''. {{*mp}} [[1927]] – The '''[[Holland Tunnel]]''', connecting [[New York City]]'s [[Manhattan]] with [[Jersey City, New Jersey]], under the [[Hudson River]], opened. {{*mp}} [[1970]] – The '''[[1970 Bhola cyclone|Bhola tropical cyclone]]''' hit the densely populated [[Ganges Delta]] in [[East Pakistan]] (now Bangladesh), killing an estimated 500,000 people. {{*mp}} [[1982]] – The '''[[Vietnam Veterans Memorial]]''' in [[Constitution Gardens]] in [[Washington, D.C.]], was dedicated. {{*mp}} [[1992]] – The [[High Court of Australia]] ruled in '''''[[Dietrich v The Queen]]''''' that although there is no absolute right to have publicly funded counsel, in most circumstances a judge should grant any request for an adjournment or stay when an accused is unrepresented. </ul> ==Notes== {{*mp}} [[SS Vestris]] appears on [[Wikipedia:Selected anniversaries/November 12|November 12]], so SS Yarmouth Castle should not appear in the same year. {{divhide|end}} </noinclude> '''[[November 13]]''': [[Calendar of saints|Feast Day]] of '''[[John Chrysostom|Saint John Chrysostom]]''' (Christianity); '''[[Diwali]]''' ([[Hinduism]], [[Sikhism]] and [[Jainism]], 2012) <div style="float:right; margin-left:0.5em;"> [[File:Nevado del Ruiz 1985.jpg|The Nevado del Ruiz volcano|100x100px]] </div> {{*mp}} [[1954]] – [[Great Britain national rugby league team|Great Britain]] defeated [[France national rugby league team|France]] at the [[Parc des Princes]] in [[Paris]] to win the [[1954 Rugby League World Cup|first]] '''[[Rugby League World Cup]]'''. {{*mp}} [[1982]] – South Korean [[boxing|boxer]] '''[[Duk Koo Kim]]''' suffered fatal [[Traumatic brain injury|brain injuries]] during a match with American [[Ray Mancini]] near [[Las Vegas]]' [[Caesars Palace]], leading to significant rule changes in the sport. {{*mp}} [[1985]] – The volcano '''[[Nevado del Ruiz]]''' ''(pictured)'' erupted, causing a [[lahar|volcanic mudslide]] that '''[[Armero tragedy|buried]]''' the town of [[Armero]], Colombia, and killed approximately 23,000 people. {{*mp}} [[1990]] – A man began shooting people indiscriminately in [[Aramoana]], New Zealand, '''[[Aramoana massacre|killing thirteen people]]''' in the country's deadliest criminal shooting. {{*mp}} [[2007]] – '''[[Batasang Pambansa bombing|An explosion]]''' hit the [[Batasang Pambansa]] complex in [[Quezon City]], the [[Philippines]], killing [[House of Representatives of the Philippines|Congressman]] [[Wahab Akbar]] and at least four others. </ul> {{SelAnnivFooter|Month=November|Day=13}}<noinclude> </noinclude>
